data.title: 2024 Triumph Bonneville Speedmaster
data.meta_description: Demo 2024 Triumph Bonneville Speedmaster  FOR SALE in Glasgow, . Glasgow Harley-Davidson Dealership. West Coast Triumph Glasgow 0141 248 9171
data.text:
Description :

Iconic Bonneville Riding.

Iconic Bonneville DNA, with timeless sophisticated style married to truly modern capability. The Bonneville Speedmaster boasts a range of impressive rider-focused technology which includes Ride-By-Wire Throttle, Road and Rain Modes, Switchable Traction Control, ABS, LED Lighting and Cruise Control.

Additionally, the bike features an enhanced multi-functional clock beside the intuitive handlebar mounted scroll button so that you can ride and adapt with ease. Furthermore, the versatile and interchangeable twin seat setup features a sculpted deep foam construction and separate lumbar support for the rider seat. Swept back beach bars, forward foot controls, 16" wire spoke wheel and the premium finish and detailing are what give the Speedmaster its trademark classic British custom, attitude and superior laid-back style.

* Mileage may vary.

This brand-new Speedmaster has had a first service and comes with the remainder of the manufacturer's warranty and a full tank of fuel. Your part-exchange is welcome. Not local? No problem - nationwide delivery is available.

Powered by the 1200cc high torque parallel twin engine, the bike provides effortless acceleration, with its smooth, linear power delivery. The twin airbox setup and unique twin-skin bright chrome exhaust delivers the Speedmaster's rich, deep and distinctive sound. The Speedmaster has the perfect combination of smooth performance and tone for maximum enjoyment.

Key features of this 20204 Speedmaster:

1200cc Parallel Twin Engine

Ride By Wire Throttle

2 Ride Modes (Road and Rain)

Cruise Control

Switchable Traction Control

ABS

Full LED Lighting

If this Speedmaster has caught your attention, contact the team at West Coast Triumph to learn more and receive your personalised video!

This Demo Pacific Blue & Silver Ice 2024 Triumph Bonneville Speedmaster is for sale at West Coast Triumph Glasgow, Scotland. Contact West Coast Triumph Glasgow today to schedule a test-ride. If this isn't the exact Triumph you're looking for we can help you revise your search. We're sure to have the perfect motorcycle for you at our showroom in Glasgow, where we host one of the largest selections of new and used motorcycles. Visit the UK's No1, West Coast Triumph Glasgow, your Premier Triumph dealership. Ride home on a Triumph bike today!

West Coast Triumph Glasgow

Delivery is available across Scotland and the North of England on all of our Motorcycles. Have your Demo bike delivered straight to your front door, we cover all areas of Central Scotland & The Highlands including Aberdeen, Forfarshire, Argyll, Ayrshire, Banff, Perth, Renfrewshire and many more! Located in Newcastle, Carlisle, Durham or Yorkshire? No problem, we'll deliver your dream motorcycle to wherever you are in the country.

Map Directions: 434 Hillington Road
